dmca.title: Videos DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Twitter
dmca.body:
Hello,

In response to your notice of claimed infringement, we have removed the reported materials from the site.

Thanks,

[redacted]
Twitter Trust & Safety
----------------------------------------------
[redacted], Jun-26 02:32 pm (PDT):



On 6/26/2011 2:24 PM, Twitter Support wrote:
> ##- Please do not write below this line -##
> Twitter
>
> Hi [redacted],
>
> We have received an email from you to our copyright mailbox.
>
> If you have submitted a DMCA notification to this email address, you 
> MUST reply to this email to confirm your request with the following 
> statement: "The information in my notification is accurate, and, under 
> penalty of perjury, I am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright 
> owner. This statement serves as my electronic signature."
>
> Important information:
>
> 1. You must reply to this email to confirm your request.
> 2. Any reply to this message other than the required confirmatory 
> statement or responses to specific requests for clarification from our 
> team will be disregarded.
> 3. We cannot receive attachments. Please ensure the entire message is 
> included in the body per the instructions in our copyright policy, or, 
> submit your request using our online form at: 
> https://support.twitter.com/forms/dmca.
> 4. We review reports in the order in which they are received. Please 
> refrain from submitting duplicate requests to avoid being filtered as 
> spam.
> 5. Any subsequent DMCA reports must be submitted as a new ticket 
> through our support form located at 
> https://support.twitter.com/forms/dmca or per the instructions in our 
> copyright policy. Any unsolicited responses to this message will be 
> disregarded.
>
> Helpful Tip:
> Please report alleged copyright infringement using our copyright 
> report form: https://support.twitter.com/forms/dmca. Using this form 
> will result in a faster turn around time than submitting via email.
>
> Please be aware that under 17 U.S.C. 512(f), you may be liable for any 
> damages, including costs and attorneysâ€™ fees incurred by us or our 
> users, if you knowingly materially misrepresent that material or 
> activity is infringing. If you are unsure whether the material you are 
> reporting is in fact infringing, you may wish to contact an attorney 
> before filing a notification with us.
>
> More information about our Copyright and DMCA Policy is available 
> here: https://support.twitter.com/articles/15795.
>
> Thanks,
> Twitter Trust & Safety
>

-- 
[redacted]
Authorized DMCA Agent
Email: [redacted]takedownpiracy.com



----------------------------------------------
[redacted], Jun-26 02:24 pm (PDT):

I am a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive
